description: This patch adds extra Horadric Cube recipes. Converts items to rare versions with random attributes and duplicates most items

cubemain.txt: 1 weapon + 1 identify Scroll -> rare weapon of same type	1			0					3	weap	isc	wms					"usetype,rar"																																																																																							0
1 armour + 1 identify Scroll -> rare armour of same type	1			0					3	armo	isc	wms					"usetype,rar"																																																																																							0
1 weapon + 2 health potions -> duplicate item	1			0					3	weap	"hpot,qty=2"						useitem																													useitem																																																										0
1 armour + 2 health potions -> duplicate item	1			0					3	armo	"hpot,qty=2"						useitem																													useitem																																																										0
1 charm + 2 health potions -> duplicate item	1			0					3	char	"hpot,qty=2"						useitem																													useitem																																																										0
